name: Mala Gochujang Noodles (韓式麻辣拌麵)
description: A fusional take on summer cold noodles inspired by Taiwanese and Korean flavors. Spicy, cool, and refreshing, ready within 15 minutes! Can be eaten hot or cold.

recipeInstructions.name: Make the Noodles. Cook noodles according to package instructions. If eating them cold, drain noodles and soak in ice water while you prepare the sauce.
recipeInstructions.text: Make the Noodles. Cook noodles according to package instructions. If eating them cold, drain noodles and soak in ice water while you prepare the sauce.

recipeInstructions.name: Make the Mala Gochujang Sauce. Simply whisk together all sauce ingredients.
recipeInstructions.text: Make the Mala Gochujang Sauce. Simply whisk together all sauce ingredients.

recipeInstructions.name: Prepare Additional Toppings & Finish. If using bean sprouts, blanch them in salted boiling water for 30-45 seconds & drain. Drain noodles from the ice bath and toss together with sauce. Top with bean sprouts, kimchi, sesame seeds, and scallions. Enjoy Immediately.
